HSM Module to map HSM Modules to Filesystem ID's.
This service can be used to handle different HSM storage systems org.dcm4chex.archive.hsm.module.MappedHSMModule The default constructor MappedHSMModule Define mapping between FilesystemID and HSMModule.
Format:<fsID>=<HSMModule Service Name>[<newline><fsID>=<...>[..]]
Use 'NONE' to disable mapping.
Example:
tar:/store1=dcm4chee.archive:service=FileCopyHSMModule,type=Command
